channel.title: Looking for RSPS Client 562, 614 or 634 loading cache 657
channel.description: I am using Mezzyscape 562 loading 657 source but thee client doesn't work for me if can someone post a client and cache plz? I can't find any good ones the don't work for me. Google doesn't help me much.... Plz post them here

item.title: Looking for RSPS Client 562, 614 or 634 loading cache 657
item.dc:creator: @ComputerLove ComputerLove
item.description:
@ComputerLove wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:8, topic:418941”][quote author=ComputerLove link=topic=521478.msg3790793#msg3790793 date=1319266658]

Don’t use mezzy, is rubbish.

all it’s missing is map data, it takes 5mins to add.

just use pdf, dump the map data.

I only spent like 5 mins looking at it through tv didn’t like it at all + the makers not the nicest guy.

I hate mezzy though, he leeched mezzyscape, and he’s a pissed of kid.

I’d just use project dungeonfest. Austin is extremely nice.

kk i tried ur client and cache. and i downloaded all caches in clientsetting.java. Tried v2 which works but glitches, v1 which doesn’t work, v3 idk. Should i change the this at clientsetting.java??

public static final String cacheLink = "http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip

import java.awt.Color;


public class ClientSettings {

        public static String getCacheDir() {
                return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.southscape_cachev4"; //only change this if you edit cache
        }
        public static final String cacheLink = "public static final String cacheLink = "http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip
"; //make sure it zip
        public static final int cacheRevision = 2; //change this if you edit cache
        //v1 Cache: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42618933/.southscape_cachev1.zip
        //v2 Cache: http://www.fathienblade.org/forum/files/fathien668.zip
        //v3 Cache: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42618933/.southscape_cachev3.zip
        //v4 Cache: http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip
        
        
        public static final String ip = "127.0.0.1";
        public static final int port = 43594;
        public static final String background_music_name = "Scape Original"; //rs classic music <3
        public static final String serverName = "Southscape"; //server name, also auto changes client title and load bar
        public static final String websiteLink = "http://southscape.freesmfhosting.com/"; //so it goes ur website instead of rs, example on acc creation terms service button
        public static final Color startLoadClientBackgroundColor = Color.black; //Color.black default
        public static final boolean disable_server_list = true; //dont disable this :D, ofc you may but then serverlist doesnt work anymore
        public static final boolean disable_ukeys_check = true; //containers table information check but ppl give weird names for stuff as: "ukeys"
        public static final boolean disable_keys_request = false; //if this true, disable_ukeys_check has to be true too, when this true, you can load client without connecting server
        
        /*
         * WEBCLIENT
         */
        //for webclient all you have to do is jar and sign
        //I RECOMMENT YOU TO USE JARMAKER APP FOR THAT http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html
        //main-class: client
        //applet-class:client too
        
        /*
         * dont worry even trying hacking, this user is limited :)
         */
        public static final String server_list_database = "173.236.35.162:3306/tkoscap1_alex"; //ip, database
        public static final String server_list_user = "tkoscap1_alex2"; //user
        public static final String server_list_pass = "lol"; //pass
}

lie this? maybe?
[/quote]

lol what? It should work.[/quote]

kk but ur client has been removed… 562/668 client

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“ComputerLove, post:7, topic:418941”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=521478.msg3790483#msg3790483 date=1319251231]

Don’t use mezzy, is rubbish.

all it’s missing is map data, it takes 5mins to add.

just use pdf, dump the map data.

I only spent like 5 mins looking at it through tv didn’t like it at all + the makers not the nicest guy.

I hate mezzy though, he leeched mezzyscape, and he’s a pissed of kid.

I’d just use project dungeonfest. Austin is extremely nice.
[/quote]

kk i tried ur client and cache. and i downloaded all caches in clientsetting.java. Tried v2 which works but glitches, v1 which doesn’t work, v3 idk. Should i change the this at clientsetting.java??

public static final String cacheLink = "http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip

import java.awt.Color;


public class ClientSettings {

        public static String getCacheDir() {
                return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.southscape_cachev4"; //only change this if you edit cache
        }
        public static final String cacheLink = "public static final String cacheLink = "http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip
"; //make sure it zip
        public static final int cacheRevision = 2; //change this if you edit cache
        //v1 Cache: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42618933/.southscape_cachev1.zip
        //v2 Cache: http://www.fathienblade.org/forum/files/fathien668.zip
        //v3 Cache: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42618933/.southscape_cachev3.zip
        //v4 Cache: http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip
        
        
        public static final String ip = "127.0.0.1";
        public static final int port = 43594;
        public static final String background_music_name = "Scape Original"; //rs classic music <3
        public static final String serverName = "Southscape"; //server name, also auto changes client title and load bar
        public static final String websiteLink = "http://southscape.freesmfhosting.com/"; //so it goes ur website instead of rs, example on acc creation terms service button
        public static final Color startLoadClientBackgroundColor = Color.black; //Color.black default
        public static final boolean disable_server_list = true; //dont disable this :D, ofc you may but then serverlist doesnt work anymore
        public static final boolean disable_ukeys_check = true; //containers table information check but ppl give weird names for stuff as: "ukeys"
        public static final boolean disable_keys_request = false; //if this true, disable_ukeys_check has to be true too, when this true, you can load client without connecting server
        
        /*
         * WEBCLIENT
         */
        //for webclient all you have to do is jar and sign
        //I RECOMMENT YOU TO USE JARMAKER APP FOR THAT http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html
        //main-class: client
        //applet-class:client too
        
        /*
         * dont worry even trying hacking, this user is limited :)
         */
        public static final String server_list_database = "173.236.35.162:3306/tkoscap1_alex"; //ip, database
        public static final String server_list_user = "tkoscap1_alex2"; //user
        public static final String server_list_pass = "lol"; //pass
}

lie this? maybe?[/quote]

lol what? It should work.

all it’s missing is map data, it takes 5mins to add.

[/quote]

I hate mezzy though, he leeched mezzyscape, and he’s a pissed of kid.

I’d just use project dungeonfest. Austin is extremely nice.[/quote]

kk i tried ur client and cache. and i downloaded all caches in clientsetting.java. Tried v2 which works but glitches, v1 which doesn’t work, v3 idk. Should i change the this at clientsetting.java??

public static final String cacheLink = "http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip

import java.awt.Color;


public class ClientSettings {

        public static String getCacheDir() {
                return System.getProperty("user.home") + "/.southscape_cachev4"; //only change this if you edit cache
        }
        public static final String cacheLink = "public static final String cacheLink = "http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip
"; //make sure it zip
        public static final int cacheRevision = 2; //change this if you edit cache
        //v1 Cache: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42618933/.southscape_cachev1.zip
        //v2 Cache: http://www.fathienblade.org/forum/files/fathien668.zip
        //v3 Cache: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/42618933/.southscape_cachev3.zip
        //v4 Cache: http://www485.megaupload.com/files/8d0a5a51a04993491d096b6b552da810/cache.zip

        public static final String background_music_name = "Scape Original"; //rs classic music <3
        public static final String serverName = "Southscape"; //server name, also auto changes client title and load bar
        public static final String websiteLink = "http://southscape.freesmfhosting.com/"; //so it goes ur website instead of rs, example on acc creation terms service button
        public static final Color startLoadClientBackgroundColor = Color.black; //Color.black default
        public static final boolean disable_server_list = true; //dont disable this :D, ofc you may but then serverlist doesnt work anymore
        public static final boolean disable_ukeys_check = true; //containers table information check but ppl give weird names for stuff as: "ukeys"
        public static final boolean disable_keys_request = false; //if this true, disable_ukeys_check has to be true too, when this true, you can load client without connecting server
        
        /*
         * WEBCLIENT

        //for webclient all you have to do is jar and sign
        //I RECOMMENT YOU TO USE JARMAKER APP FOR THAT http://download.cnet.com/JAR-Maker/3000-2213_4-10588876.html
